price: O you who believe, why do you say what you do not do?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
